content:
CIGARfest : America's Mega Herf

An annual three day event presented by Cigars International. This one of a kind event is nothing like you have ever witnessed before. 72 hours of cigar filled insanity. Come and enjoy a some of the finest cut cigars in all of North America surrounded by 5,000 other cigar enthusiasts. All three days are jam packed with samples, live entertainment, once in a lifetime giveaways and so much more!

Save The Date: April 29 - May 1, 2016
